DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study examine neuropsychological effect transvascular aortic valve implantation ( TAVI ) . Patients undergo TAVI usually suffer congestive heart failure low cardiac output may limit cognitive ability . TAVI result significant improvement cardiac function therefore may improve cognitive function . However , TAVI may also associate stroke may therefore negative impact cognition . Therefore , study investigator wish perform battery standardized neuropsychological test TAVI test net effect TAVI cognitive performance time . The investigator plan include patient plan TAVI study test , 3,7 , 30 360 day post TAVI standardize battery test .
DOC.brief_title: Neuropsychological Testing Patients Undergoing Transvascular Aortic Valve Implantation
DOC.criteria: All patient severe aortic stenosis candidate TAVI Able perform test Able sign inform consent Language barrier preclude administration test Existing dementia Existing disease limit life expectancy le 180 day
